title: cultural_data_National_Museum_of_Singapore
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.specialistapps.national_museum.
Application Name: National Museum of Singapore.
Number of Reviews: 24.00.
Application Description: The National Museum app takes you on a journey through 700 years of Singapore’s history. Learn more about the nation’s defining moments, challenges and achievements from its earliest beginnings to the independent, modern city-state it is today.With a history dating back to its inception in 1887, the National Museum of Singapore is the nation’s oldest museum with a progressive mind. We aim to capture and present to visitors the heart and spirit of Singapore and its rich cultures, traditions and stories. Be it world-class exhibitions, visually-arresting art installations, thought-provoking performances or dynamic festivals, there is something for everyone at the National Museum.Included in this app:·         Chinese, Bahasa Melayu and Tamil translations·         Museum map·         Interactive Augmented Reality game based on the Farquhar Collection of Natural History·         Audio tours available in English and Mandarin (coming soon).
Number of Characters in Description: 946.00.
Overall Rate: 3.50.
First Page Reviews: Using the app (v3.3.8) with the museum's WiFi (which is fast enough to download the app instantly) , the app is stuck in "connecting" status (on Huawei mate 20 phone) for our entire visit to the museum. it doesn't have much pictures of the artefacts and it would be better if there are more pictures related to the exhibitions How come no photos and so little artefacts? Can you make it easier to find? Within the "About Us" page links is corrupted. Once clicked, application stop working and restarts  Language system does not work. English changing to Mandarin  "No content found for lookout code".
Number of Characters in First Page Reviews: 599.00.
Last Update: 31/03/2020.
Ending Date: 19/03/2021.
Number of Days Since Last Update: 353.00.
App Size: 88.00.

 Version Required: 5.00.
